about_the_game:
Welcome to the Moonlight Peaks: Decorating Demo

Experience life as a vampire in the enchanting town of Moonlight Peaks! In this heartwarming life-sim, you'll embark on a journey to prove to your skeptical father, Count Dracula, that even the undead can lead lives filled with compassion.

Key Features:

🏰 Immersive Decoration: Dive into the art of interior design as you transform your vampire abode. Choose from a range of exquisite furniture, decorations, and themes to create a haven that reflects your unique style.

🎨 Personal Expression: Express your creativity and identity through your home decor. Every choice you make tells a story, making your dwelling a reflection of your journey and growth.

🍃 Foraging and Crafting: Explore the enchanting landscapes around Moonlight Peaks to gather resources for crafting unique decorations. Let the world inspire your designs.

🧪 Potions and Spells: Unlock the mysteries of ancient potions and spells. Use your newfound skills to enhance your surroundings and bring an extra touch of magic to your home.

🕰️ Limited-Time Preview: Enjoy a sneak peek into the enchanting world of Moonlight Peaks with a special decorating demo. Immerse yourself in the magic and possibilities that lie ahead.

  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 660 2GB
  • DirectX: Version 10

Recommended:

short_description: Experience life as a vampire in Moonlight Peaks! Master the art of potion-making and spell-casting, tend to your supernatural farm, and make your mark on the magical town. Befriend the local werewolves, witches and mermaids, and maybe even find eternal love along the way.
